name: Rimeflow Rapier
title: Frost Operative: Rimeflow Rapier
in_play_description: After your Frost Operative, who has this card equipped, triggers Blood-Bonded Shadow: Causes the Bond of Life stacks the opponent's active character has to double.

attributes.source: Reward for accepting the Tavern Challenge against the Frost Operative at The Cat's Tail and achieving all corresponding challenge objectives in a Friendly Fracas

skills.desc:
Combat Action: Equip this card when your active character is Frost Operative
After equipping this card, immediately use Frosty Interjection once.
After your Frost Operative, who has this card equipped, triggers Blood-Bonded Shadow: Causes the Bond of Life stacks the opponent's active character has to double.
(You must have Frost Operative in your deck to add this card to your deck.)
